MainPage.title: Welcome to my portfolio
MainPage.description: Portfolio website of Carles del Río Francés as Web and mobile developer

HeroSection.description: Let's get in touch. I'm available for freelance, full-time, part-time, contract and consulting opportunities.

AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.description: I am a front-end developer specializing in web and mobile applications with expertise in SEO and AIO optimization for worldwide clients. I am passionate about creating interactive and responsive experiences using technologies such as JavaScript, React, NextJS, React Native with Expo, Node.js, Express, Jira and Confluence, HTML, CSS and Git. I provide comprehensive SEO/AIO optimization services to enhance website visibility and performance for businesses around the globe. I am always looking for new opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills.

webDevelopmentPortfolioWebsite.title: Web Development Portfolio Website
webDevelopmentPortfolioWebsite.description: A portfolio website highlighting my web and mobile development projects. Built with NextJS, React, TypeScript and TailwindCSS.

graphicDesignPortfolioWebsite.title: Graphic Design Portfolio Website
graphicDesignPortfolioWebsite.description: A portfolio website displaying my graphic design projects. Built with React, Express and CSS3.

myPensionWebApp.title: My Pension Web App
myPensionWebApp.description: A web application and client portal for managing pension plans. Built with NodeJS, React, Redux, Express, Sass, Bootstrap and MySQL.

myPensionMobileApp.title: My Pension Mobile App
myPensionMobileApp.description: A mobile app for managing pension plans in Germany. NodeJS, React Native, Expo, Sass, MySQL.

remoryoMobileApp.title: Remoryo Mobile App
remoryoMobileApp.description: A mobile app designed to enhance communication with elderly loved ones by generating and sending monthly printed magazines. Built with React-Native, Expo, styled-components, Zustand, PuppeteerHTMLPDF, MySQL, Stripe and push notifications.

leoLeo.title: Leo, leo... ¿Qué lees? (PWA)
leoLeo.description: A web application designed to manage participants and organize a yearly Spanish reading contest for German schools. Since 2019. React, Express, CSS3, MongoDB. Admin panel.

theCirculArtStatistics.title: The CirculArt Statistics
theCirculArtStatistics.description: An engaging web application designed to visualize client statistics for theCirculArt, a company that provides innovative circular economy solutions for enterprises in the financial sector.

sweetTextAIGenerator.title: Sweet Text AI Generator
sweetTextAIGenerator.description: A web application designed to generate sweet text messages using AI. React, Express, CSS3, chat-GPT3.

foodOrderingAndDeliveryApp.title: Food Ordering and Delivery App
foodOrderingAndDeliveryApp.description: A mobile app designed to order and deliver food, based on the NotJustDev tutorial by Vadim Savin. React Native, Expo, Supabase, stripe, push-notifications.

apiRESTful.title: API RESTful
apiRESTful.description: A robust and scalable RESTful API designed to provide seamless integration and efficient data management for a variety of services. Built with Node.js, Express and MongoDB. It ensures high performance and reliability.

mosaic.title: Mosaic.photography (PWA)
mosaic.description: Design and development of a full-stack web and PWA application (Next.js 15+, TypeScript, CSS3, Supabase, AWS S3 with CloudFront CDN and Vercel for deployment). Mosaic is a curated gallery showcasing the public domain works of iconic nude photographers, designed with a focus on web performance and SEO optimization (optimized for Google Core Web Vitals and search engine rankings) to ensure fast load times and high search engine visibility.

ContactSection.title: Let's connect
ContactSection.subject: Subject
ContactSection.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about web development, mobile apps, and SEO services.

question1.q: What web development services do you offer?
question1.a: I specialize in modern web development using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. I build responsive websites, web applications, e-commerce platforms, and provide comprehensive SEO optimization services to improve your online visibility.

question2.q: Do you develop mobile apps for iOS and Android?
question2.a: Yes! I develop cross-platform mobile applications using React Native with Expo. This allows me to create high-quality apps that work seamlessly on both iOS and Android devices while maintaining native performance and user experience.

question3.q: How can SEO optimization help my business?
question3.a: SEO optimization improves your website's visibility in search engines like Google, Bing, and other major search engines worldwide. I implement technical SEO, content optimization, global and local SEO strategies, and AIO (Artificial Intelligence Optimization) to help you rank higher and attract more qualified traffic to your business.

question4.q: Why choose a freelance developer over an agency?
question4.a: As a solo developer, I offer personalized attention, competitive pricing, faster communication, and direct collaboration. You work directly with the person building your project, ensuring your vision is understood and implemented exactly as you need it. I'm also more flexible with project timelines and budget requirements.

question5.q: Do you work with clients in Germany?
question5.a: Absolutely! I work with clients worldwide and understand the requirements of different markets, including GDPR compliance, web standards, and SEO strategies for global audiences. I am experienced in collaborating with international clients and adapting to their business practices.

question6.q: Can you help businesses in Chile with web development?
question6.a: Yes! I provide comprehensive web development and SEO services to businesses worldwide. I understand the dynamics of different markets and can optimize your website for global and local search engines as needed.

question7.q: What makes React and Next.js good choices for my project?
question7.a: React and Next.js are industry-leading technologies that provide excellent performance, SEO capabilities, and scalability. Next.js offers server-side rendering, automatic optimization, and built-in SEO features that make your website faster and more search-engine friendly. These technologies also ensure your project is modern, maintainable, and future-proof.

question8.q: Do you work remotely or on-site?
question8.a: I primarily work remotely, which allows me to serve clients globally while keeping costs competitive. I use modern collaboration tools like Slack, Zoom, and project management platforms to ensure seamless communication. On-site meetings can be arranged for local clients if necessary.

question9.q: What are your typical project costs and pricing structure?
question9.a: My pricing varies based on project complexity, timeline, and requirements. I offer competitive rates for web development (${webDevHourly}), mobile app development (${mobileDevHourly}), and SEO services (${seoHourly}). I also provide fixed-price quotes for well-defined projects. Contact me for a personalized quote.

question10.q: How long does a typical web development project take?
question10.a: Project timelines vary based on complexity. A simple portfolio website takes 1-2 weeks, a business website with CMS takes 2-4 weeks, and complex web applications can take 6-12 weeks. Mobile apps typically require 4-8 weeks. I provide detailed timelines during the project planning phase.

question11.q: How much does SEO cost for small businesses?
question11.a: SEO costs for small businesses vary based on your needs and goals. I offer flexible SEO packages starting from ${seoBasic} for basic local SEO, ${seoFull} for comprehensive SEO including content optimization, and ${seoCompetitive} for competitive industries. I also provide one-time SEO audits (${seoAudit}) and project-based SEO optimization for specific needs.

question12.q: How long does it take to see SEO results?
question12.a: SEO is a long-term investment. You typically start seeing initial improvements in 2-3 months, with significant results appearing after 4-6 months of consistent optimization. For local SEO in less competitive markets, results can be faster (6-12 weeks). I provide monthly reports to track progress and adjust strategies as needed.

question13.q: What is local SEO and why do I need it for my business?
question13.a: Local SEO helps your business appear in local search results when customers search for services 'near me' or in specific locations like 'web developer Berlin' or 'desarrollador web Santiago'. It's crucial for small businesses as 80% of local searches lead to conversions. I optimize your Google Business Profile, local citations, and implement location-based keywords to increase your local visibility.

question14.q: How much does it cost to develop a mobile app for my small business?
question14.a: Mobile app development costs depend on complexity and features. A simple business app with basic features costs ${mobileAppSimple}, while more complex apps with advanced functionality range from ${mobileAppComplex}. Using React Native allows me to create both iOS and Android versions simultaneously, reducing costs by ${reactNativeSaving} compared to native development.

question15.q: Do I need both iOS and Android apps for my business?
question15.a: It depends on your target audience and budget. Worldwide, Android and iOS have varying market shares depending on the region. I recommend starting with both platforms using React Native for cost-effectiveness, or focusing on the platform most popular with your target audience if budget is limited.

question16.q: Can you convert my existing website into a mobile app?
question16.a: Yes! I can create Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) that work like native apps or develop hybrid mobile apps that integrate your existing web content. PWAs are cost-effective (${pwa}) and work on all devices, while hybrid apps (${hybridApp}) offer better app store presence and native features.

FAQ.contactCta: Still have questions? I'm here to help!

SEO.whyTitle: Why SEO & AIO Matter for Your Business
SEO.whyText: SEO (Search Engine Optimization) is the foundation of online visibility. Whether you target Chile, Germany, or a global audience, ranking high on Google and other search engines means more traffic, leads, and sales. AIO (Artificial Intelligence Optimization) is the next evolution—optimizing your site for AI-powered search (like ChatGPT, Google SGE, Bing Copilot) and voice assistants.
SEO.issue1: Poor technical SEO (slow site, missing meta tags, broken links)
SEO.issue2: Weak local SEO (not showing up for searches in your region)
SEO.issue3: Low Core Web Vitals scores (bad mobile experience, slow load)
SEO.issue4: Content not optimized for user intent or AI/LLM search
SEO.issue5: Missing structured data (FAQ, Organization, Service, etc.)
SEO.issue6: Not leveraging AI tools for content, analytics, or automation
SEO.technique1: Technical SEO audits and fixes (Core Web Vitals, mobile-first, HTTPS)
SEO.technique2: Local SEO for Chile, Germany, or worldwide (Google Business, local citations, hreflang)
SEO.technique3: Content optimization for both search engines and AI (clear, structured, FAQ-rich)
SEO.technique4: Implementing structured data (JSON-LD for FAQ, Person, Service, etc.)
SEO.technique5: AI-powered keyword research and competitor analysis
SEO.technique6: Optimizing for AI/LLM search (answer-focused, semantic markup, up-to-date info)
SEO.whyChooseTitle: Why Choose My SEO & AIO Services?
SEO.whyChoose1: Proven results in Chile, Germany, and international markets
SEO.whyChoose2: Solo developer: direct communication, fast delivery, tailored strategy
SEO.whyChoose3: Cutting-edge AIO: your site is ready for the future of search
SEO.contactCta: Still have questions? I'm here to help!
